name: rk-groups-jekyll-site
description: Multi-company static Jekyll site for RK Groups with modern performance and accessibility features

scripts.minify: npm run minify-css && npm run minify-js
scripts.minify-js: npx terser sw.js -o sw.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser site-links.js -o site-links.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser check-hrefs.js -o check-hrefs.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser report-issue.js -o report-issue.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser companies/rk-oxygen/gorakhpur/details.js -o companies/rk-oxygen/gorakhpur/details.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser assets/js/performance-monitoring.js -o assets/js/performance-monitoring.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser assets/js/search.js -o assets/js/search.min.js --compress --mangle && npx terser assets/js/error-monitoring.js -o assets/js/error-monitoring.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build: npm run minify && echo 'Assets minified successfully'
scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push

author: RK Groups
